title: Leveraging the complex interplay between arbuscular mycorrhizal fungi, seasonal dynamics, and genotypic diversity to optimize maize productivity in semi-arid agroecosystems
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Kipkorir Koech, Gilbert Koskey, Ezekiel Mugendi Njeru, John Maingi
